lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I can give back to the community of the world, and know that my money is going to projects that I approve of. I also like that I can see how my donation works not just for one person, but for many.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phones to help people with their cell phone service, answering many questions about different products and issues.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to make a meaningful impact on the lives of others around the world
lender.occupational_info: I am in law school

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: it beats charity
lender.occupational_info: I help refugees access affordable health care

lender.name: Jo Elsa
lender.loan_because: I want to help women develop the skills they need and get the credit they deserve to prosper and thrive all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help faculty at my college learn to teach more effectively using technology.

lender.name: Morley
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: Life is too big to make just One Decision Music is too large for just One Station Love is too big for just One Nation God is too big for just One Religion. - Michael Franti

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I met many interesting, motivated and kind people on my travels in southeast asia. I am glad that I can help some of them.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently applying my IT skills at non-profits based in New York City.

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25: 35-36 "For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me."
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of a non-profit organization that runs community centers in various neighborhoods in Fullerton, CA

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: I know a little to me can ba a LOT to someone else.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: Apexstone Amoy Marble & Granite is a Xiamen,China based stone manufacturer and global supplier of marble, granite, travertine, limestone, and engineering stone products.
lender.occupational_info: Apexstone Amoy Marble & Granite,a Xiamen,China based manufacturer and exporter of worldwide marble , worldwide granite , china granite, china marble , sand stone, travertine, limestone, Our range covers slab, tile, countertop, vanity top, tub surround, soap dish, sink, fireplace mantel, stone molding, mosaic, medallion, drawer knob, for interior designers; fountain, sculpture, statuary, stone carving, urns and vases, for decoration specialists; lite panel wall cladding, column, baluster, railing, step, garden furniture, paving stone, for architects; on commercial projects or industrial constructions.

lender.name: Burger
lender.loan_because: i'm paying it foward.

lender.name: Elixir9 ~ Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my abundance of opportunities and advantages and wish to pay that forward to other women entrepreneurs. I believe in the power of pursuing dreams and achieving goals. $1 from each sale of my jewelry goes into my fund. I hope to be able to make larger and larger loans as my own business succeeds.
lender.occupational_info: I am the designer and metalsmith of a line of jewelry called Elixir9. I work with sterling silver, semi-precious stones, and other mixed media. I fabricate each piece by hand in my San Francisco studio.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the success of those that strive to become independent and self sufficient

lender.name: sane1147
lender.loan_because: Jesus is my personal saviour. God tells us to love others.

lender.name: Jennifer L.
lender.loan_because:
Both my parents came to Canada as refugees. I am fortunate to have been born and raised in a country with many freedoms and privileges, with rights that are enforced and women are allowed to be independent and strong.
I have always been one to volunteer my time and efforts, rather than donate money. The money I donate is worth less than the time and efforts of educated, caring people.
My mother is a proud woman who would rather accept a helping hand, than a red pocket (an envelope of money in Chinese, a "hand out" in other words). She has taught me this lesson and I have extended it out to others.
"Give a man a fish; feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish; feed him for a lifetime." - Lao Tzu

lender.name: Silje
lender.loan_because: Respecting a strangers wish to make a living by hard work and pride in his or her work, is something everyone should do. I have previously been an entrepreneur myself. I think everyone should help eachother as much as we can, strangers as friends.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer teacher. I teach in a variety of computer software to people of all ages. Some are beginners while some are experts. I love my job!

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate, and I believe me must help others reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: As an insurance agent I help people protest their home and assets in the event of a catastrophe.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: by an "accident" of birth I live in the richest nation in the world and I feel compelled to share in whatever ways I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a chief financial recordkeeper for a nonprofit organization in my community.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I have it so good, and so many other people don't!

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and have needed help in the past. It is time to give back!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Family Nurse Practitioner and own my own clinic.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Service is the rent we pay for our time on earth. Honest, hardworking people are worth helping.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Eliza
lender.loan_because: i believe in it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a law student in New York City

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Bob Harris (/lender/bobharris) says it's a good idea to, and I see his point.
lender.occupational_info:
I help the people who write newspapers with their computers. They usually need it. I've been at it since 1995.
My work involves travel, and I've been as far west as Guam, east as Ireland, north as Alaska and south as Hawaii.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think that it will make life better for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I manage credit card portfolios for a large bank.

lender.name: Dayna
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people

lender.name: Rabbinical Students
lender.occupational_info:
Shalom!
We are the student body of the Reconstructionist Rabbinical College. We are loaning to Kiva as one of our many tzedakah projects in order to help people around the world.
We believe that all people are created b'tzelem Elohim, in the image of the Holy One, and that it is our sacred obligation to help people in need wherever they may live change their lives forever. Thus, whenever we collect enough funds, we loan to whomever is first on the list, without discrimination.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: a little bit can go a long way
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids with special needs or who are in special circumstances

lender.name: Evelyn & Margaret
lender.loan_because: We believe in supporting women-owned businesses. Our company, as "Experts on Women," hopes to empower women in all phases of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Red Kite Business Advisors is a consulting firm offering marketing, planning, advertising, creative, branding, strategies, tactics and media consulting services. We help clients increase market share, improve ROI, and create brand advocates. We specialize in marketing b2b and b2c, with an expertise in reaching the female market.

lender.name: candice
lender.loan_because: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Holli
lender.loan_because: I like to be connected to the other side of the world. I also like to help others through their rough times. I want to give encouragement to people to help them follow their dreams and their dreams for their kids. It makes me feel better about myself too. The loans I give is not only helping the people recieving them, it helps me feel better and encourage me to help more.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I love it. Went to Haiti when I was 15 and changed my life forever. Kiva is amazing revolutionary tool that could change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked anywhere from nonprofit management to marketing project manager.

lender.name: Claudio
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make an impact on people's lives around the world and help alleviate their problems through micro-investing.
lender.occupational_info: I learn things in school.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My company performs medical diagnostic testing to help develop new treatments and improve medical care.

lender.name: peterfriday
lender.loan_because: joel and alison.
lender.occupational_info: I make sweet boats

lender.name: brainwise
lender.occupation: Tech Writer, Interfaith Minister, Theater Techie
lender.loan_because: I can. Really, it's as simple as that. Oh, and because I really got behind Sloane Berrent and her mission (see http://www.thecausemopolitan.com/)

lender.name: RSR
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for future generations of people - all people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the non-profit sector in the United States and I help young people get access to important educational materials and knowledge.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: to be able to help people grow and achieve higher life goals
lender.occupational_info: private equity investments

lender.name: Sherman
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to live in a country like Canada where most of us have so much to be thankful for. It feels good to be able to help out, so others can benefit...and in time they too may be able to 'Pay Forward'!

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Opportunities should be available for those who wish to improve their lives and those of their families. I've been fortunate to have received assistance when I needed it; it's my privilege to return the gift.

lender.name: Andy & Karla
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I provide english language christian resources to people in predominantly non english speaking countries.

lender.name: Addie
lender.loan_because: I am keen to see people with the energy, desire and passion want to improve the lives of their familes and their communities. If one person can leverage the small amount of money I make available to create personal and community wealth and a stable financial base then it was a worthwhile cost effective investment.
lender.occupational_info: Sleeping mostly with brief periods of eating and "soft" excercise.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I believe in ability of entrepreneurship to make a change
lender.occupational_info: I fight email spam and viruses

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because:
I care about the quality of life of other human beings.
I happened to be born in a place with lots of wealth and opportunity, and I feel a responsibility to spread that around.
i believe that humanity has greater good in it than it does evil, and if we all try to express as much good as we can - that good will prevail and we will survive as a species.
lender.occupational_info: After a film has been shot, I work with the Director to choose which shots go in the movie, in what order they go, and how long to stay on each one.

lender.loan_because: Giving back should come naturally.

lender.name: Anja K.B.
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.loan_because: its good to help other people
lender.occupational_info: i buy and sell,work my own hours

lender.name: Miguel Rego Gomes
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in our cruel world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on web sites.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It is such an easy way to do something that will be truly meaningful, not just for a person, but for families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Member of the Legislative Assembly of NSW in Australia and Mayor of the City of Lake Macquarie.

lender.name: Nirmalya
lender.loan_because: For my Business.Received a Project

lender.loan_because: I believe there are hard working people that deserve a chance to own a business and with a little help the chance of success increases.

lender.occupational_info: My daily job includes lots of paper and computer work. I sit in a cubicle for 9 hours a day reading reports and making decisions based on Washington State law.

lender.loan_because: I WOULD LIKE TO BE LOANED SOME DAY
lender.occupational_info: Demanding but Efficient

lender.name: Takayuki
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful that I can support people trying to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computer literacy and study educational computer system at a university in Japan.

lender.name: psycho
lender.loan_because: It feels like well-spent money - and they magically return! (I hope ^^)
lender.occupational_info: I'm making things better.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I have a small business of my own. And I realize how lucky I am to be running it here and under such favourable circumstances...

lender.name: tracey
lender.loan_because: It is my way of giving back to the worlds community and to support others to have opportunities to improve their quality of life and that of their children and community,
lender.occupational_info: My work is enjoyable and challenging. I support families in identifying their strenghs and moving forward in all they endevour

lender.name: Brian & Lorna
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed beyond measure and want to share what God has given to us.

lender.name: Christopher & Annie
lender.loan_because: We want to give people the oportunity to acheive their goals. We also want to raise the standard of living in all countries and comunities.
lender.occupational_info: Christopher is a Manufacturing Engineer and designs tools and processes for manufacturing industrial machinery. Annie is a teacher and teaches reading and social science to children.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world. ~Anne Frank

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I visited my sponsored child in the Dominican Republic and realized with a littlemoney I can help the poverty stricken people of this world one dollar at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired and have become passionately involved with Children International and my sponsored children.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of entrepreneurship to change everything.
lender.occupational_info: I design and conduct fireworks displays for all sorts of events, public and private.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Gonzalo
lender.loan_because: A better world is possible

lender.name: Jeff & Janet
lender.loan_because: When I heard of this I was simply thrilled what an awesome idea.

lender.name: Whit Fletcher
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner who understands the power of capital. I am blessed to have been born in such a great country as the USA and want to help other small business owners around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help home sellers or home buyers understand the condition of the property they wish to sell or buy.

lender.name: Mattityahu
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves. The highest level of giving: "Giving an interest-free loan to a person in need; forming a partnership with a person in need; giving a grant to a person in need; finding a job for a person in need; so long as that loan, grant, partnership, or job results in the person no longer living by relying upon others." ~Maimonides, Mishneh Torah, Hilkhot Matanot Aniyim (Laws about Giving to the Poor), Chapter 10:7-14:

lender.name: FreeXenon
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lender.name: Gra
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for my grandchildren.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it works.
lender.occupational_info: Policy review and mission support

lender.name: Barrow House Inn
lender.loan_because: When thinking of microfinance, we should all think *macro* (big). Every individual on his "small blue ball" (the late great Carl Sagan deemed the earth a "BIG blue ball' - looooong before globalization made the world much, much smaller... 'flat' if you will) and Kiva allows me to have at least some impact on the life of an entrepreneur trying to give back to their community. Plus, I'm a house, so it's not like I can exactly pick up and move myself to the Phillipines or anything ;)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a bed & breakfast - like a very small hotel, except with all the personal touches and services that most hotels do not provide.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I believe business can change the world :-)
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school learning how to run a business.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: It is astounding to see what can be accomplished. I hope that more scandinavians discover the possiblities of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take" -Wayne Gretzky

lender.name: Ang
lender.loan_because: I can! And I believe in supporting others to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I use natural healing methods, such as herbs, homeopathy, acupuncture, nutrition and more to support people achieving optimal health.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it feels really good!

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: It helps genuinely hardworking family people trying to make a better future for themselves and their families. We often talk about "empowerment" - well this really is it!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who design, create and manage computer security systems for a large corporation in Europe, Middle East and Africa.

lender.name: Anurati
lender.loan_because: birth is arbitrary, and I was fortunate enough to have been born out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at UC Berkeley, and I intern at Kiva! :)

lender.name: Vibeke
lender.loan_because: the only way to make progress in this world
lender.occupational_info: help people build houses

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have also benefited from complete strangers who took a chance on me and believed in my dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I fix broken businesses, and make good ones even better.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I love people who have the initiative to do something for themselves. I wish my city would create more incentives for home-grown entrepreneurial businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work to prevent disease by researching the essential reasons why poor people tend to also be the most unhealthy. From whether people can walk to where they need to go on a daily basis to what food they have access to and can afford to buy. What changes will have the most impact in terms of improving their health? How can those changes be made? These are the questions I am working to answer.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: People do great things when given the chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help people with all their non medical needs while they stay in a nursing home.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to make a positive impact

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of two boys. In my work as a midwife, I help women give birth gently and safely.

lender.name: Flor
lender.loan_because: I think is great that in this world is not everything about profits but also about helping other human beings who need the money and who would take advantage of it in better ways that I could.

lender.name: Christopher & Suzanne
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of helping someone ignite or reignite the spark of their dreams with the help of resources seemingly unavailable in their immediate vicinity.

lender.name: Arun
lender.loan_because: of love
lender.occupational_info: create computer software.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: Ever since I was a young child I had a dream of ending world hunger and this is a way to help that dream manifest. I have always been in service to humanity one way or another since the age of 8 believe it or not.
lender.occupational_info: Well I work in a Surgical Clinic. I assist in minor surgeries and I help take care of patients. I live in a coast side town in California. I love to drum, give massage, play in my garden and give as much as I can.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in the cause. I am willing to give up dinner out in order to help someone improve themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work behind the bar at a beachfront restaurant in Florida.

lender.name: Ara
lender.loan_because: I want to help change lives in a sustainable way, give people the option to bring themselves out of poverty, and level the playing field.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers for the electric company.

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: My husband and I tried to make a living as craftspeople in the past and found it difficult to secure loans. It's great to be able to help others start and maintain their businesses!
lender.occupational_info: I advise freshman and sophomore university students about their academic and personal goals.

lender.name: Tina

lender.name: Eleanor-Ruth

I was lucky to be born in the USA and I know that if I had been born in another part of the world I would also need a little extra help.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: People need access to money to help finance their goals, dreams, livelihood. If I'm fortunate enough to have some money to lend to help make that happen, then hopefully I can help someone reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help build brands and sell products. I work on creative ideas and innovations that earn more profit on behalf of my clients.

lender.name: Aaron

lender.occupational_info: Software Developer

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: As a member of the world community, I feel I must help others when I can---as others have helped me when I needed assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I work to create a more sustainable world by helping parents raise their children to be financially independent, conscious consumers.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It helps make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help people decide what kind of work they want to do and find jobs.

lender.name: Sisters of St. Joseph
lender.loan_because: We promise to stand with people who are poor by seeking out and addressing critical needs, particularly in those places where our presence could make a difference.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: The majority of people in North America have much more than they need, and die with money in the bank. What a waste of an opportunity to do good. Risk a small portion now, (really not much of a risk) to help someone deserving get ahead. Choose what you want to do with your money rather than have your relatives potentially squander it - I know that this may sound cynical, but think - if you made it, who else but you should decide how to spend it? Above all, do good - a great mantra.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is one of the best ways to make the world better.
